text: Boavista Futebol Clube, commonly known as Boavista (), is a Portuguese sports club from the city of Porto. ==Current squad== ==Titles== ===Official=== * Campeonato Nacional de Futebol Feminino: 11 **1985–86, 1986–87, 1987–88, 1988–89, 1989–90, 1990–91, 1991–92, 1992–93, 1993–94, 1994–95, 1996–97 * Taça de Portugal de Futebol Feminino: 1 **2012–13 ==References== ==External links== * Boavista's website * Boavista on zerazero.pt Category:Women's football clubs in Portugal Category:Boavista F.C. Category:Football clubs in Porto Category:Campeonato Nacional de Futebol Feminino teams
title: Boavista F.C. (women)
